overview: Is there no end to Ashley Ryder’s depravity? Collecting the hottest young studs for his voyeuristic pleasure, he locks the door behind them and in order to leave, they are ordered to strip and show Ashley, through the cameras he’s hidden around the cells, exactly what they’re packing. The sadistic world of Ashley is laid bare as he subjects his chosen few to giant dildos, gallons of lube and even a very unrepentant clown masked slave-boy to do his bidding for him.  There’s little chance of escape until the young men have had their holes opened and dicks worked, and with the use of a fuck machine in a very special scene, it’s not as if the boys don’t enjoy themselves, however they found themselves in this predicament!  Welcome to Ashley’s world, your journey has only just begun!
title: Trapped
